scripts.build-ios-bundle: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.build-android-bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.clear: watchman watch-del-all && yarn cache clean --force && npm cache clean --force  && rm yarn.lock && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-* && yarn  && yarn start --reset-cache
